posts.name: Jake Musa
posts.cooked: Hello, I am programming a swerve drive this year and right now it seems to be working correctly except when I try to turn the bot using the right stick the modules don’t go to the same angle, and they face different directions. Here is the code https://github.com/JakeMusa/4717-Swerve-2022.git

posts.name: vargoose84
posts.cooked: What did you fix? So we may all learn?

posts.name: Jake Musa
posts.cooked: All of the motor ID’s were messed up because the build team switched the modules, so the two front modules were diagonal from each other.

posts.name: Eli Barnett
posts.cooked: Just dropping in to complement the progress you’ve made on your code since your original help request.  You’re making very good use of the available WPILib features!

user_custom_fields.user_field_4: Robot apartments! invisible suburbs! skeleton treasuries!

posts.custom_user_title: Robot apartments! invisible suburbs! skeleton treasuries!

posts.name: Jake Musa
posts.cooked: Thank you, it’s been a very difficult few years for FRC so I greatly appreciate all of the help.

posts.name: Jake Musa
posts.cooked: Just want to ask another question, but I didn’t feel like making another thread but as of right now our swerve drive has two fatal flaws. The first one is that sometimes the modules can flip 180, so everything becomes backwards and turning doesn’t seem to work well. The second is that when driving straight the robot just turns without any other controller input. Any help is appreciated.

posts.name: system
posts.cooked: This topic was automatically closed 365 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

suggested_topics.title: Java RioLog not working
suggested_topics.excerpt: After deploying robot code the RioLog window opens but never has any output. Maybe 1 time out of 30 it does but it is very rare. Any ideas on how to diagnose this issue?

suggested_topics.title: CTRE License Issue
suggested_topics.excerpt: Season Pass requires both the roboRIO and the radio to be configured with the correct team number.
